original_text: Then Judah said to Onan, ‘You should marry your dead brother's wife and have sex with her. You are her dead husband's brother. You must have a son who will become your dead brother's descendant.’
korean_text: 유다가 오난에게 이르되 네 형수에게로 들어가서 남편의 아우 된 본분을 행하여 네 형을 위하여 씨가 있게 하라

sentences.original_text: You should marry your dead brother's wife
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 죽은 형의 아내와 결혼해야 한다

sentences.original_text: You are her dead husband's brother
who will become your dead brother's descendant
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 네 죽은 형의 후손이 될 것이다
